sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — The Democratic Party’s endorsed candidate for governor of Pennsylvania, state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, headed into 2022 with $13.4 million in his campaign account, a state record for a candidate heading into an election year.
author: Marc Levy
title: Shapiro sets campaign cash record to start election year

sentence: Democrats, meanwhile, already have a presumptive nominee in Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who has crossover appeal and a national reputation built in part by pushing back against Trump’s election lies.
title: Inside the chaotic GOP primary for governor in Pennsylvania

sentence: Please understand that this is abnormal and beyond the guardrails, like so much in our civic discourse at this time.” Dave La Torre, a spokesperson for Corman, told the Philadelphia Inquirer that voters in Pennsylvania “deserve to know that their candidates for governor are transparent and comply with the law.” Seidman reports, “(A) letter Wednesday from Corman campaign lawyer Zachary M. Wallen alleged Mastriano ‘may have committed flagrant and willful violations’ of state law by ‘submitting an obviously deficient and incomplete campaign finance report.’ The Corman campaign also sent the letter to state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, a Democrat who is also running for governor.”

title: Pennsylvania’s gubernatorial race turns nasty as candidate Corman demands criminal investigation of rival Mastriano

sentence: The Fox News poll did not include Democratic candidates with the party backing Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro.

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM/AP) — A massive Republican primary field for governor in Pennsylvania is spurring growing discomfort among party leaders that a widely splintered primary vote could produce a winner who cannot beat Democrat Josh Shapiro in November’s general election.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania’s big GOP primary field for governor has party leaders worried

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — Democrat Josh Shapiro is rolling out the first tax proposal of his candidacy for governor, saying Friday that he would use surplus state cash and federal pandemic aid to eliminate state taxes on cell phone bills, send payments to car-owning households and expand Pennsylvania's rent and property tax rebate program.
title: Josh Shapiro Rolls Out First Tax Relief Plan Of Governor's Race

sentence: “This is about partnering with other Republicans to make sure we have a process that doesn’t get hijacked by the media or liberal activists.” Murtaugh said, “the media doesn’t have an interest in picking the best Republican candidate to beat Josh Shapiro.
